hey nile red, is there any other way to do this without the DCM?

I would like to share the method which was done out of curiosity " how is caffeine in colour"I took 5 grams of tea sample and to it I added 500 ml water and kept for boiling.on boiling I added 10 grams of heavy Magnesium Oxide to it and kept for boiling again for 2 hours. Adding water in same not exceeding the 500 ml volume just for the purpose not let the conical dry.then cooled the whole solution and filtered through 201 filter paper.Filtrate was 500 ml.I then took 200 ml filtrate and added 20 ml Sulphuric acid (2 ml sulphuric acid : 18 ml water).Took the whole solution in separating funnel and extracted 6 times with chloroform.combined all these layers of chloroform and kept on water-bath till whole chloroform evaporates.And here I get white coloured caffeine in good amount.Thank you!!
